facts.fact_text: Mexico’s gross fixed investment fell 6.4% year on year in November 2025

evidences.evidence_text: Mexico’s gross fixed investment fell 6.4% year on year in November 2025

facts.fact_text: Spending on machinery and equipment plunged 14.5%, led by a 19.5% fall in both domestic and imported transport equipment.

evidences.evidence_text: Spending on machinery and equipment plunged 14.5%, led by a 19.5% fall in both domestic and imported transport equipment.

facts.fact_text: Construction rose 1.3%, rebounding from a 0.6% contraction in October, as a 10.3% surge in residential activity offset a 6.5% fall in non-residential building.

evidences.evidence_text: Construction rose 1.3%, rebounding from a 0.6% contraction in October, as a 10.3% surge in residential activity offset a 6.5% fall in non-residential building.

facts.fact_text: On a seasonally adjusted basis, investment edged up 0.4% month on month, slowing from October’s 0.9% gain.

evidence.evidence_text: Mexico’s gross fixed investment fell 6.4% year on year in November 2025
Spending on machinery and equipment plunged 14.5%, led by a 19.5% fall in both domestic and imported transport equipment.
Construction rose 1.3%, rebounding from a 0.6% contraction in October, as a 10.3% surge in residential activity offset a 6.5% fall in non-residential building.
On a seasonally adjusted basis, investment edged up 0.4% month on month, slowing from October’s 0.9% gain.
